name: Get Down To Earth (sardorian)
description:
Partner with your friend over single keyboard, and battle against other players. In this game Local-coop meets Networked multiplayer.  You play the role of two astronauts who need to gather enough gravitrons to be able to return to earth. You will have to cooperate with your partner to be able to control the spaceship. You can play lawful or try to steal other players goods.

1-Player controls: WASD for movement and [U] for Use and [I] for Interaction

2-Player controls: Arrows for movement [1] for Use and [2] for Interaction

Objective is as following:

Use Thruster to Navigate across the map

Use Gravitron Gun to siphon Gravitron Clouds

After Getting enough Gravitrons your partner must go to outer space to transfer them into your spaceship thruster!

You can steal Gravitrons from other players Gravitron Guns too!

Let the brawl Begin!
